summary: Frontend-only testing completed for SkillFlow Master Data page. All 10 requested features verified working correctly. NEW validation messages in Step 2 of Master Work Order form are functioning as expected - they dynamically show users exactly what they need to do to proceed (number of job roles needed, target allocation required).
passed_tests: 1. Master Data page loads with all 3 tabs (Work Orders, Job Roles, Resources)
2. Work Orders tab shows existing work orders (5 work orders displayed)
3. New Work Order dialog opens when clicking 'New Work Order' button
4. Step 1 to Step 2 navigation works after filling Work Order Number
5. Job role dropdown in Step 2 shows available roles (CSC/Q0801, ELE/Q4601)
6. Selecting a job role adds it to the selected list with default target
7. NEW: Validation messages show when button is disabled - displays 'To proceed:' with bullet points for missing requirements
7a. Validation shows 'Select X more job role(s)' when not enough roles selected
7b. Validation shows 'Allocate targets to equal X (currently: Y)' when targets not fully allocated
7c. Validation message disappears when all conditions are met
8. Step 2 to Step 3 navigation works when all job roles selected AND targets fully allocated
9. Resources tab shows Trainers, Center Managers, and SDC/Center Infrastructure sections
10. SDC creation form (Add Center) shows all fields including infrastructure details
context_for_next_testing_agent: All validation messages in Step 2 of Master Work Order form are working correctly. The validation box (amber background) appears when: 1) Not all required job roles are selected, OR 2) Target allocation doesn't equal total training target. The validation message dynamically updates as user makes changes and disappears completely when all conditions are satisfied, enabling the 'Next: SDC Districts' button.

test_scenarios.message_shown: To proceed: Select 1 more job role(s) (1/2 selected), Allocate targets to equal 150 (currently: 30)
To proceed: Allocate targets to equal 150 (currently: 60)
None (validation box hidden, Next button enabled)

feature_verification.job_role_selection: WORKING - Adds to selected list with default target
feature_verification.validation_messages: WORKING - NEW feature verified, shows dynamic messages
feature_verification.step2_to_step3: WORKING - Enables when all conditions met
feature_verification.resources_tab: WORKING - Shows Trainers, Managers, Infrastructure sections
